question: Which among the following is correct regarding ‘Currency Chests”?
option1: Storehouses where banknotes and rupee coins are stocked on behalf of the Reserve Bank
option2: Store houses where foreign currencies are stocked on behalf of the RBI
option3: Companies which are authorized to store and deal in Foreign currencies
option4: Banks authorized by Reserve Bank of India for Currency Exchange
answer: Storehouses where banknotes and rupee coins are stocked on behalf of the Reserve Bank
